bibl.author: W. A. Field
bibl.title: W. A. Field to George S. Boutwell, 4 August 1869

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: The enclosed letter from the Assistant U. S. Attorney at New Orleans dated July 31st, ult., with a copy of a letter sent by him to the Secretary of the Interior, are respectfully referred to the Secretary of the Treasury for such consideration as he may think fit.
